name: Senior React Native developer
description:
Social Discovery Ventures is the world’s largest group of social discovery venture companies which unites more than 40 brands, an investment fund, and a venture studio. For more than 20 years we have been creating premium international dating services and in our SDV Lab we develop and test new products with a focus on video streaming, AI technologies, entertainment, and game mechanics. Our products are already used by more than 140 million users in 100 countries around the world. We strive to have 10 times as many.

Now our team unites more than 700 professionals from all over the world. Our international team of like-minded people and professionals solve ambitious tasks everyday and create truly global products. We value focus on result, proactive approach and we are always for new and unconventional ideas.

Our offices are in Malta (Sliema), Latvia (Riga), the USA (New York, San Francisco), China (Chongqing), Hong Kong, Colombia (Medellin), Queensland (Australia), Armenia (Erevan), Kenya (Nairobi), and Georgia (Batumi).

The target market for our products is the USA, Western Europe, Canada, UK, Asia, and Australia.

We are now looking for a strong React Native developer for our mobile applications

Your tasks will be:

  • Participation in the design of the application architecture;
  • Development of new and refinement of current functionality;
  • Implementation of components and services;
  • Quality control of implementation.

We expect from you:

  • Experience in developing mobile applications on React Native;
  • Have experience with TypeScript;
  • Have experience and understanding of the practical application of SOLID principles;
  • Theoretically (or practically) familiar with FRP and rxjs;
  • Familiar with the nuances of HTTP(S), WS(S) protocols;
  • You have experience in splitting TK into subtasks and can solve them yourself;
  • Do you know and understand how native UX/UI components look and behave;
  • Have experience of code review

Why choose us?

  • This is an international project for a globally-minded product and that entails ambitious and unconventional tasks;
  • You will obtain experience with the latest technologies and be able to contribute to creating internal solutions;
  • You will work an environment where innovative ideas are heard and implemented;
  • You will have opportunities for career progression and development within the company;
  • You will become part of a young and efficient team of professionals that offers a lot to learn.
